name: Prison Battleship 3 - Brainwashing Route of Boiling Sand
name_original: Prison Battleship 3 - Brainwashing Route of Boiling Sand
description: By day, Beatrice and Kila Kushan are strong-willed mother-daughter doing ship duty. By night they're brainwashed hypersexual servants the soldiers line up to fuck! The pattern requires programming their supple minds night after night. Multiple endings based on choices of degrading prostitute "public relations"!!
